edu.monash.fit2099.engine

Class GameMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap

  • public class GameMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing one map within the system. The system can have multiple maps, and Actors can move between them. Only the map that the player is currently on will be displayed, but Actors on all maps will be queried on each turn for their moves -- that is, time does not stop when the player leaves a map.

        groundFactory - Factory to create Ground objects
